review: I bought this Chromecast for my mom for Christmas. Setup and installation was very easy. My mom was able to catch on quickly, and after just one walk through of how to use it, she was on her on. She wanted to be able to stream Netflix movies and this device is perfect for it.
author: J. Watson

review: Had a little trouble installing this mostly because there is little instructions included. I luckily have an IT person in the family and he got it up and running quickly. A lot of fun for a cheap price.

review: Easy to use. Does what it's supposed to. Low price. Absolutely love it!may not work on all public networks. My work has it blocked, but not surprised by this. Not the products fault.

review: Very cool device, easy to setup. The only downside is the lack of apps available.. I am sure that will get better in the future.

review: This is a GREAT device! We use it all the time to stream videos from Netflix and play music from Pandora.I was a bit frustrated that it didn't work so well in the hotel we were at but that's due to the hotel's wifi setup not the Chromecast.I gave it 4 stars because I wish it was compatible with more options for playing media.
